name: Coliseum's Angel
description:
How to play:

Kill the first enemy by groundpounding with shift

Then use the left mouse button to swing the sword

Lore: An angel who had fallen from grace, having been rejected by the gods of the Roman Empire and cast out of Olympus, was made to pay the price for their transgressions. Upon arriving on Earth, the fallen angel was given a single chance at life, in the form of entertainment for the gods, testing their abilities in combat and strength.

Credits:

El Matias: Lore and research

Teu: Art, Music and code
